tidbits.title: Biodiversity Paradise
tidbits.description: Colombia is one of the world's most biodiverse countries, boasting various ecosystems, from Amazon rainforests to Andean peaks, harboring abundant wildlife.

tidbits.title: Vibrant Culture
tidbits.description: Colombia is renowned for its vibrant culture, including colorful festivals, salsa music, delicious cuisine, and a warm and welcoming attitude known as 'la buena onda.'

tidbits.title: Coffee Heritage
tidbits.description: Colombia is famous for its high-quality coffee, with regions like the Coffee Triangle producing some of the world's finest beans, deeply rooted in the country's culture and economy.
